examples: People held handkerchiefs over their mouths.
People came from all over the country.
A regular newsletter keeps people in touch with local events.
people living in rural areas.
People around the world enjoy various forms of music as a universal language.
words.defineEn: human beings as a group, including men, women, and children
words.defineVi: con người như một nhóm, bao gồm cả đàn ông, phụ nữ và trẻ em

examples: I see things differently now.
Things certainly move fast in the blogosphere.
Things like this take time.
Things have changed dramatically since then.
Finally things are moving in the right direction.
words.defineEn: an object that we cannot or do not need to name when we are talking about it
words.defineVi: một đối tượng mà chúng ta không thể hoặc không cần đặt tên khi nói về nó

examples: Things like this take time.
Time is moving on.
The time passed quickly.
Time to bust a move.
The contractor is really taking their time.
words.defineEn: the quantity that is measured in seconds, minutes, hours, etc. using a device like clock
words.defineVi: số lượng được đo bằng giây, phút, giờ, v.v. bằng thiết bị như đồng hồ

examples: ways to save money on heating bills.
Ways to save money on heating bills.
Way to start Carol!
After all, love will find a way.
A bit of good fortune came my way.
words.defineEn: a method or style according to which something is done
words.defineVi: một phương pháp hoặc phong cách theo đó một cái gì đó được thực hiện

examples: This job puts years on you.
The apple tree in our backyard produces juicy fruits every year.
Cancer kills thousands of people every year.
The apple orchard typically yields a bountiful harvest each year.
Company profits took a tumble last year.
words.defineEn: a period of time that is made up of twelve months, particularly one that starts on January first and ends on December thirty-first
words.defineVi: một khoảng thời gian được tạo thành từ mười hai tháng, đặc biệt là một tháng bắt đầu vào ngày đầu tiên của tháng một và kết thúc vào ngày 31 tháng 12

examples: The agreement followed months of negotiation.
The school semester starts next month.
We have a family gathering every month.
The permit runs for three months.
Each month she holds a meeting with her entire staff.
words.defineEn: each of the twelve named divisions of the year, like January, February, etc.
words.defineVi: mỗi phần trong số mười hai phần được đặt tên của năm, như tháng Giêng, tháng Hai, v.v.

examples: The days passed slowly.
The day brings a sense of vitality and liveliness to the world.
The news really made my day.
The hotel provides fresh towels for the guests every day.
Our car has seen better days!
words.defineEn: a period of time that is made up of twenty-four hours
words.defineVi: một khoảng thời gian được tạo thành từ hai mươi bốn giờ

examples: She made coffee for us all.
The coffee in the mug was a dark.
The coffee table was a dark wood color.
Surprisingly, the little café had the best coffee in town.
The little café had, surprisingly, the best coffee in town.
words.defineEn: a drink that is made from mixing water with some crushed seeds, called coffee beans, usually hot and brown in color
words.defineVi: một thức uống được làm từ nước trộn với một số hạt nghiền nhỏ, được gọi là hạt cà phê, thường nóng và có màu nâu

examples: Life goes on.
Life is unfair.
That experience changed my life.
Does life exist on other planets?
Life is just a bowl of cherries these days!
words.defineEn: the state of existing as a person who is alive
words.defineVi: trạng thái tồn tại như một người đang sống

examples: That guy really hates my guts.
That guy went under the radar for the entire season.
The guy's on the bottle 24/7.
This guy is a waste of skin!
Two could play at that game, smart guy.
words.defineEn: a man or fellow
words.defineVi: một người đàn ông hoặc đồng nghiệp

examples: Intellectually, this man and I are worlds apart.
Her children mean the world to her.
The department led the world in cancer research.
The novel is worlds apart from his academic writings.
She had broken the world 100 meters record.
words.defineEn: the planet Earth, where we all live
words.defineVi: hành tinh Trái đất, nơi tất cả chúng ta sống

examples: His dedication and hard work played a big part in the company's success.
The crowd parted to let the truck pass.
She knows her part in the play back to front.
The media, as always, played an important part in the election campaign.
Sailors spend the better part of their time at sea.
words.defineEn: any of the pieces making a whole, when combined
words.defineVi: bất kỳ phần nào tạo nên một tổng thể, khi được kết hợp

examples: Today is Monday.
The lawyers put another nail in her coffin today.
The euro hit a record low in trading today.
I saw a famous actress at the shopping mall today.
All winter coats are half-price today.
words.defineEn: the day that is taking place right now
words.defineVi: ngày đang diễn ra ngay bây giờ

examples: Meat and mass never hindered man.
Men still hold most positions of power in this country.
Both men wore confident smiles.
Man, that was a black day for the organization.
All men must die.
words.defineEn: a person who is a male adult
words.defineVi: một người là nam giới trưởng thành

examples: The woman has eyes like a hawk!
The woman hit the mugger with her umbrella.
The old woman knitted blankets for her grandchildren.
That young woman was close as an oyster!
Women sometimes damage their skin by going overboard with abrasive cleansers.
words.defineEn: a person who is a female adult
words.defineVi: một người là phụ nữ trưởng thành

examples: The question requires critical thinking and analysis.
The quiz consisted of multiple-choice questions.
The book raises many important questions.
The waiter patiently answered our questions about the ingredients in the dish.
Can I ask a question?
words.defineEn: a sentence, phrase, or word, used to ask for information or to test someone’s knowledge
words.defineVi: một câu, cụm từ hoặc từ, được sử dụng để hỏi thông tin hoặc để kiểm tra kiến thức của ai đó

examples: His number's up this time.
The report includes a number of recommendations.
His confession involved a number of other politicians in the affair.
Thirteen is a prime number.
I had a brush with him a number of years ago.
words.defineEn: a word, sign, or symbol that represents a specific quantity or amount
words.defineVi: một từ, ký hiệu hoặc ký hiệu đại diện cho một số lượng hoặc số lượng cụ thể

examples: The compass needle always points north.
The problem has now reached crisis point.
I take your point.
No point in spoiling the ship for a ha'porth of tar
The line cuts the circle at two points.
words.defineEn: the most important thing that is said or done which highlights the purpose of something
words.defineVi: điều quan trọng nhất được nói hoặc làm làm nổi bật mục đích của một cái gì đó

examples: Words beginning with a vowel.
Mark my words.
Her words were music to my ears.
Words are failing me right now.
The children were following every word of the story intently.
words.defineEn: (grammar) a unit of language that has a specific meaning
words.defineVi: (ngữ pháp) một đơn vị ngôn ngữ có ý nghĩa cụ thể

examples: They still get cases of typhoid there.
After all, one case of the trots hardly spells disaster.
The Supreme Court heard the case on Tuesday.
The case was tried before a jury.
The latest skiing accident is a case in point.
words.defineEn: an example of a certain kind of situation
words.defineVi: một ví dụ về một loại tình huống nhất định

examples: Can you read music?
The music was far too loud for my liking.
Her words were music to my ears.
Set this poem to music.
That music really gets me.
words.defineEn: a series of sounds made by instruments or voices, arranged in a way that is pleasant or exciting to listen to
words.defineVi: một loạt âm thanh được tạo ra bởi các nhạc cụ hoặc giọng nói, được sắp xếp theo cách dễ chịu hoặc thú vị để nghe

examples: The teacher placed the books on the desk.
I placed the shiny red apple in the basket.
He placed the puzzle pieces back into the puzzle box.
My computer is placed on the desk in the office.
The bolt clicked into place.
words.defineEn: the part of space where someone or something is or they should be
words.defineVi: một phần của không gian nơi ai đó hoặc một cái gì đó hoặc họ nên được

examples: ideas that are light-years ahead of their time
The idea hit me like a tornado.
Who's been putting ideas in your head?
Their ideas seem to be far more down to earth and sensible.
He’d run out of ideas.
words.defineEn: a suggestion or thought about something that we should do
words.defineVi: một gợi ý hoặc suy nghĩ về một cái gì đó mà chúng ta nên làm

examples: The business is losing money.
Money can't buy happiness.
Money means nothing to him.
A lot of people give money to good causes.
My parents give me pocket money every week.
words.defineEn: something that people use to buy and sell goods and services, can be in the form of coins or paper bills
words.defineVi: thứ mà mọi người sử dụng để mua và bán hàng hóa và dịch vụ, có thể ở dạng tiền xu hoặc hóa đơn giấy

examples: The helicopter transported the injured person to the hospital.
Every person has the right to express their opinions and beliefs.
One person argued the toss for four hours before he agreed to pay.
A person's character can often be deduced from their actions.
The other person had the wrong end of the stick, and now you needed to correct the misapprehension.
words.defineEn: one human being, when gender or age is not relevant
words.defineVi: một con người, khi giới tính hoặc tuổi tác không liên quan
